document.full_text: azerbaijan wants to regain control of the nagorno-karabakh enclave, which is now populated by ethnic armenians, but the dispute is growing more dangerous.
document.title: 'frozen conflict' between azerbaijan and armenia begins to boil
lines_and_colors: azerbaijan wants to regain control of the nagorno-karabakh enclave, which is now populated by ethnic armenians, but the dispute is growing more dangerous.
